content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: honey_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "salmon", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 51, "index": 31}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 6, "index": 39}, {"type": "sweet_berries", "quantity": 16, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a honey_bottle, I first need to craft glass. Glass can be crafted from sand or red_sand, and I have red_sand in my inventory at slot 39. I will smelt the red_sand into slot 11 to get the glass.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Ok
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: honey_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "glass_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 51, "index": 31}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "sweet_berries", "quantity": 16, "index": 42}]

thought: In order to craft a honey bottle, I need to place honey block and glass bottle in the crafting table. Glass bottle is already available in my inventory, so I need to craft glass. The recipe for glass requires smelting sand or red_sand. I have red_sand at slot 39, so I will smelt that into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: honey_bottle

thought: I have crafted one piece of glass, but I need three pieces of glass to craft a glass bottle. Therefore, I will continue smelting red_sand from slot 39 to another empty slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 13 with quantity 1

Ok
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 14 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: honey_bottle

thought: I have crafted all three pieces of glass needed to craft a glass bottle. Therefore, I will start crafting the glass bottle by moving one piece of glass from slot 12 to the crafting table (eg., 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I have moved one piece of glass into the crafting table. I need to move the other two pieces of glass to the left and right of the first piece of glass. Therefore, I will move the second piece of glass from slot 13 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 3 with quantity 1
